it.polimi.se2018.view.gui

Class PrivateSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.gui.PrivateSelection

  • public class PrivateSelection
extends java.lang.Object
    There class to make the player handle the selection of the PrivateObjectiveCard at the beginning of the single-player game.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrivateSelection() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void selectLeftCard()
      The action to do when the left card is clicked: the choice must be confirmed by the user, and than the method to send the message to the SinglePlayerController on the ClientView is called.
      void selectRightCard()
      The action to do when the right card is clicked: the choice must be confirmed by the user, and than the method to send the message to the SinglePlayerController on the ClientView is called.
      void setCards()
      The method to set the images of the cards on the ImageView.
      void setParentController(JavaFxDisplayer parentController)
      The setter for the parentController.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public PrivateSelection()

    • Method Detail

      • setParentController

        public void setParentController(JavaFxDisplayer parentController)
        The setter for the parentController.
        Parameters:
        parentController - the main controller of the gui.

      • selectLeftCard

        public void selectLeftCard()
        The action to do when the left card is clicked: the choice must be confirmed by the user, and than the method to send the message to the SinglePlayerController on the ClientView is called.

      • selectRightCard

        public void selectRightCard()
        The action to do when the right card is clicked: the choice must be confirmed by the user, and than the method to send the message to the SinglePlayerController on the ClientView is called.

      • setCards

        public void setCards()
        The method to set the images of the cards on the ImageView. The information of which cards to show is contained in the ViewDataOrganizer, whose reference is contained in parentController.
